snippet: The decision by the State Objections Board means Senator Pat Roberts will be on the ballot in the Aug. 5 Republican primary.
abstract: Kansas elections board rejects claim that Sen Pat Roberts is not truly a Kansas resident, allowing him to seek re-election.
lead_paragraph: The decision by the State Objections Board means Senator Pat Roberts will be on the ballot in the Aug. 5 Republican primary.

headline.main: Kansas: Senator Prevails in Challenge to His Residency
headline.print_headline: Kansas: Senator Prevails in Challenge to His Residency
